    • Constructor Detail

      • Car

        public Car(java.lang.String[][] carParts)
        Initiates the car with car parts as the parameter. Every car part is injected as a string array. The first value is used a the key and the second value is used as the display name.
        Parameters:
        carParts -

    • Method Detail

      • setTestMode

        public static void setTestMode(boolean bool)
        Select to true if you want to run in test mode. Set to false by default. Displays health values in status messages in test mode.
        Parameters:
        bool -

      • tear

        public void tear(java.lang.String carPart)
        Decreases health of specified car part. If the car part does not exist, the health of all car parts will be decreased.
        Parameters:
        carPart -

      • getHealthStatusAsBytes

        public byte[] getHealthStatusAsBytes(java.lang.String carPart)
        Returns the health status of specified car part. If the car part does not exist, the car health will be returned.
        Parameters:
        carPart -
        Returns:
        Status message as a byte array

      • serve

        public void serve(java.lang.String carPart)
        Restores the health of all car parts. If the car part does not exist, all the car parts will be served.
        Parameters:
        carPart -

      • getHealthStatus

        public java.lang.String getHealthStatus(java.lang.String carPart)
        Returns the health status of specified car part. If the car part does not exist, the car health will be returned.
        Parameters:
        carPart -
        Returns:
        Status message as a string
